attributes.action: ask the Sports Minister, RH Richard Caborn MP, to liase with the Football Association and F.A. Premier league to revert to a 3 p.m kick off time for ALL football matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The football club which I follow has, out of a possible 38 league matches, only started a match at 3 p.m. on a Saturday only 12 times this season. In years gone by, When all matches started at 3p.m. Saturday, average attendances were up & fans could get to the game & home again afterwards via public transport.
We demand a return to a 3p.m. saturday kick off time for all football matches!
